name: Blockemon (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
My entry to the Ludum Dare 46 (theme: "keep it alive")

Blockémon  is a pokemon-like game where you let your creatures fight others and you  have to gather and throw fruits at them to heal them, or throw it at wild creatures to tame them.
And unlike in pokemon-games, battles are in real time in the overworld and you can run around freely!

use arrow keys to run around, C to jump, and X to throw fruit.

Some useful info:
-thrown fruit can be picked up again.
-throw fruit at wild blockemon to have them join your team, the lower their health, the higher the chance of success.
-you can only have 3 blockemon on your team. as soon as one dies, you can have another join you.
-if you die, or all of your blockemon die, you lose the game. After all, you have to keep 'em alive
-pay attention to each blockemon's color and their projectile's color, the colors match the elemental-type.

Now go venture into the wild!
